                            java.lang.String prompt,
                            int min,
                            int max)
        Collects robust input from the user
        Parameters:
        input - Scanner object used to get input from user
        prompt - the phrase the user will be prompted with
        min - the minimum value the user can input
        max - the maximum value the user can input
        Returns:
        number to be used in main program

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName(java.util.Scanner input,
                                       java.lang.String prompt)
        Collects a string from the user, will not accept a blank line or spaces. user will be reprompted if this happens
        Parameters:
        input - Scanner Object used to collect input from the user
        prompt - the string the user will be prompted with
        Returns:
        the string collected

      • getFileWriter

        will create a file that can be writen too
        Parameters:

        Returns:
